title: (Exchange of Information) Act 2019 (No. 51 of 2019), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Records (Exchange of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Records (Exchange of 

Information) Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal record (exchange information) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: (Exchange of Information) Act 2019 (No. 51 of 2019), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 7th day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Criminal Records (Exchange of Information) Act 2019 (No. 51 of 2019) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 February, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th February, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [37] 3
text_norm: 2 7th day february 2020 appointed day criminal record (exchange information) act 2019 (no 51 2019) shall come operation given official seal 6 february 2020 charles flanagan minister justice equality notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th february 2020 37 3

title: (Exchange of Information) Act 2019 (No. 51 of 2019), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This order appoints 7 February 2020 as the date on which the Criminal Records 
(Exchange of Information) Act 2019 shall come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [37]
